definition: a group of many things in the air or on the ground, to make milky or dull
details:
noun
- a group of many things in the air or on the ground
= synonyms: swarm
- a visible mass of water or ice particles suspended at a considerable altitude
- any collection of particles (e.g., smoke or dust) or gases that is visible
- out of touch with reality
= example: out of touch with reality
- suspicion affecting your reputation
= example: suspicion affecting your reputation
- a cause of worry or gloom or trouble
= example: a cause of worry or gloom or trouble
verb
- to make milky or dull
= example: to make milky or dull
- to colour with streaks or blotches of different shades
= synonyms: dapple
- to make less clear
= example: to make less clear
- to place under suspicion or cast doubt upon
= synonyms: corrupt
- to make gloomy or depressed
= example: to make gloomy or depressed
- to billow up in the form of a cloud
= example: to billow up in the form of a cloud
- to make less visible or unclear
= example: to make less visible or unclear
= synonyms: obscure
- to make overcast or cloudy
= synonyms: overcast
